website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality product that utilizes “Miracle Broth”, namely naturally fermented sea kelp and minerals.
pros: The subtle fragrance enhances a low-lather cleanser that is good at removing dead cells, debris and makeup
While pricey, only a pea-sized amount is needed
It leaves the skin feeling radiant and smooth
cons: The pump can be awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Cleanses Yet Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I have *extremely* sensitive skin - most products irritate, burn, or dry my skin - La Mer Cleansing Gel is the only face wash that I have used in the last ten years. I tried many different products over the years before finally finding La Mer, and this product is simply the best. I break out with most exfoliating scrubs and I have discovered that if I use the cleansing gel with my Clarisonic Pro it feels like I have had a professional facial! It is pricey, but you only have to use one pump of product to wash your face (two if you have on heavy makeup). It works and really is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: MyBeachyLife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Balance
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is mild and does the job. I have tried the other La Mer cleansers and either my face was too dry or too greasy. This cleanses thoroughly with my clarisonic. This cleanser is also good for removing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: NatFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

product_meta.title: La Mer Cleansing Gel 6.7 oz / 200 ml
product_meta.description: This oil-free cleansing gel combines magnetised tourmaline with La Mer's exclusive Deconstructed Water and nutrient-rich Miracle Broth, which is at the heard of La Mer's profound powers of transformation. This product gently draws debris, excess oil and pollutants away from the skin without irritation or drying. Suitable for all skin types.
